content: each shell have 7 double row 1 single_crochet into next chain skip 2 chain 7 double_crochet crochet review crochet chart into next chain repeat from * ending with 4 double_crochet in page 1 for guidance green last chain pull through last loop on hook and cut yarn leaving 40 cm tail did you leave a long tail do not turn go back to the beginning of row 1 pull a loop did you change to the second through the top of the 3 chain leaving a tail of about 40 cms color row 2 chain 1 single_crochet into same stitch *2 chain work a 7 double_crochet cluster over the next 7 stitches refer to stitch did you leave a long tail each purple definitions page 1 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next stitch end repeat from * to end pull through last loop on hook and cut yarn leaving 40 cm tail do not turn go back to the beginning of row 2 pull a loop do you have 15 purple through the first stitch leaving a tail of about 40 cms chain 1 diamond-like shapes row 3 single_crochet into same stitch * work 7 double_crochet into did you leave a long tail each joining stitch of next cluster single_crochet in next single purple end crochet repeat from * pull through last loop on hook and cut yarn leaving 40 cm tail do not turn go back to the beginning of row 3 pull a loop did you change back to the first through the top of the first stitch leaving a tail of about 40 cms color chain 1 single_crochet into same stitch chain 1 work a 3 row 4 did you leave a long tail each double_crochet cluster over the next 3 stitches continue as row end 2 ending with a 4 double_crochet cluster over the last 4 green stitches use the crochet chart page 1 for quick reference did you finish with a slip_stitch work 2 chain slip_stitch into the vertical edge of the headband into the vertical edge of the pull through last loop on hook and cut yarn leaving 40 cm tail headband if your 2 plaited ties are not gently adjust the strands at each end add some more strands even adjust the knots at the ties to give 9 strands each end - cut lengths of yarn 80 cms and end of the plaits and trim one double them over work 3x3x3 plaits knot the end to secure inch from knot sizing for a smaller/larger headband subtract 6/add 6 chain to foundation chain for more hats and headband patterns visit https //www etsy com/shop/bandanaheads hair accessories from bandana heads copyright © 2008 bandana heads all
